options.name: Teams
options.description: Teams are shared workspace for members to view and manage account links, tags, statuses, campaigns, conversations, and more.

options.name: Threads
options.description: Threads represent conversations between an account linked to your team and a prospect on Twitter.

options.name: Messages
options.description: Messages are the individual messages sent in a thread.

options.name: Account Links
options.description: Account links represent X accounts connected to your team.

options.name: Members
options.description: Members are Inbox users who can access the team.

options.name: Prospects
options.description: Prospects represent external profiles on X.

options.name: Tags
options.description: Tags are labels for prospects.

options.name: Statuses
options.description: Statuses are used to track the deal stage or any fixed state for a prospect.

options.name: Colors
options.description: Get predefined color options that can be used when creating or updating tags and statuses.

options.name: Team Get
options.description: Get the team associated with the supplied API token.

options.name: Threads List
options.description: List threads ordered by recency with advanced filtering

options.name: Threads Create
options.description: Create a new active thread with a prospect

options.name: Threads Lookup
options.description: Find a thread by account link ID and external identifier (platform ID or external ID)

options.name: Threads Lookup By Username
options.description: Find all threads for a prospect by their exact platform username. Returns threads across all account links.

options.name: Threads Thread Get
options.description: Get details of a specific thread

options.name: Threads Thread Update
options.description: Mark a thread done or change assignee

options.name: Threads Thread Delete
options.description: Soft delete a thread

options.name: Threads Thread Typing
options.description: Sends a typing indicator to the external party in the thread. Only supported for X Chat (encrypted) threads.

options.name: Threads Thread Settings
options.description: Update settings for a specific thread

options.name: Threads Thread Messages List
options.description: List messages in a thread with pagination support

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Create
options.description: Send a message in a thread

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Message Edit
options.description: Edit a message in a thread. Only works for X Chat (encrypted DM) threads.

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Message Delete
options.description: Delete a message in a thread. Only works for X Chat (encrypted DM) threads.

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Message History
options.description: Get the edit history and deletion status of a message. Returns all versions of the message content over time.

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add
options.value: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add
options.description: Add a reaction to a message. Only works for non-sandbox threads.

options.name: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove
options.value: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove
options.description: Remove a reaction from a message. Only works for non-sandbox threads.

options.name: Threads Messages Quick Send
options.description: Send a message without knowing the thread ID ahead of time. Automatically creates a thread if needed.

options.name: Account Links List
options.description: List all account links for the team

options.name: Members List
options.description: List all members of the team

options.name: Members Get
options.description: Get details of a specific member

options.name: Prospects Get
options.description: Get details of a specific prospect

options.name: Prospects Update
options.description: Update context of a specific prospect

options.name: Prospects Lookup
options.description: Find an Inbox prospect by platform ID. Note that not all of Twitter is included here. A separate search API will be available for profiles not in our CRM later.

options.name: Tags List
options.description: List all tags in the team

options.name: Tags Create
options.description: Create a new tag for organizing threads and prospects

options.name: Tags Get
options.description: Get details of a specific tag

options.name: Tags Update
options.description: Update a tag's name or color

options.name: Tags Delete
options.description: Delete a tag. This will remove the tag from all threads and prospects.

options.name: Tags Colors
options.description: Get a list of predefined colors that can be used when creating or updating tags

options.name: Statuses List
options.description: List all statuses in the team

options.name: Statuses Create
options.description: Create a new status to track leads through your sales pipeline

options.name: Statuses Get
options.description: Get details of a specific status

options.name: Statuses Update
options.description: Update a status's name or color

options.name: Statuses Delete
options.description: Delete a status. This will remove the status from all threads.

options.name: Statuses Colors
options.description: Get a list of predefined colors that can be used when creating or updating statuses

options.name: Colors List
options.description: Get a list of predefined colors that can be used when creating or updating tags or statuses

options.name: Events List
options.description: List webhook events for replay. Events are stored for 7 days.

name: cursorId
description: The ID of the thread to start pagination from. Must be used together with cursorTimestamp. Cannot be combined with the cursor object parameter.

name: cursorTimestamp
description: The timestamp of the thread to start pagination from. Must be used together with cursorId. Cannot be combined with the cursor object parameter.

name: cursor
description: Pagination cursor using [bracket notation](https://docs.inboxapp.com/api-reference/introduction#encoding-objects-and-arrays-in-query-params). Omit to start from the beginning. Prefer using `cursorId` and `cursorTimestamp` instead for simpler query string encoding.

name: inbox
description: Inbox view to filter threads. 'default' shows active threads, 'no-reply' shows threads awaiting response, 'requests' shows message requests, 'archived' shows archived threads.

name: limit
description: Maximum number of threads to return per page. Defaults to 20, maximum 100.

name: externalPlatformId
description: The platform ID of the prospect. Must be provided if externalId is not provided.

name: externalId
description: The Inbox external ID of the prospect. Must be provided if externalPlatformId is not provided.

name: accountLinkId
description: The account link ID to associate with this thread. This determines which connected account the thread belongs to.

name: accountLinkId
description: The account link ID associated with the thread.

name: externalPlatformId
description: The platform ID of the prospect. Must be provided if externalId is not provided.

name: externalId
description: The Inbox external ID of the prospect. Must be provided if externalPlatformId is not provided.

name: username
description: The exact platform username of the prospect (without the @ prefix).

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread to list messages from.

name: cursorId
description: The ID of the message to start pagination from. Must be used together with cursorTimestamp. Cannot be combined with the cursor object parameter.

name: cursorTimestamp
description: The timestamp of the message to start pagination from. Must be used together with cursorId. Cannot be combined with the cursor object parameter.

name: cursor
description: Pagination cursor using [bracket notation](https://docs.inboxapp.com/api-reference/introduction#encoding-objects-and-arrays-in-query-params). Omit to start from the beginning. Prefer using `cursorId` and `cursorTimestamp` instead for simpler query string encoding.

name: limit
description: Maximum number of messages to return per page. Defaults to 50, maximum 100.

name: replyToMessageId
description: The ID of the message to reply to.

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread containing the message.

name: messageId
description: The ID of the message to edit.

name: content
description: The new content for the message.

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread containing the message.

name: messageId
description: The ID of the message to delete.

name: deleteForAll
description: Whether to delete the message for all participants or just for yourself. Defaults to true (delete for all).

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread containing the message.

name: messageId
description: The ID of the message to get history for.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread containing the message.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add

name: messageId
description: The ID of the message to react to.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add

name: emoji
description: The emoji to react with.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Add
Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove

name: threadId
description: The ID of the thread containing the message.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove

name: messageId
description: The ID of the message to remove the reaction from.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove

name: emoji
description: The emoji reaction to remove.

operation: Threads Thread Messages Message Reactions Remove

name: externalPlatformId
description: The platform ID of the prospect. Must be provided if `externalId` is not provided.

name: externalId
description: The Inbox external ID of the prospect. Must be provided if `externalPlatformId` is not provided.

name: accountLinkId
description: The account link ID to send the message from.

name: platformId
description: The platform user ID (e.g., Twitter user ID).

name: name
description: The name of the tag. Must be unique within the team. Maximum 255 characters.

name: tagId
description: The ID of the tag to retrieve.

name: tagId
description: The ID of the tag to update.

name: name
description: The new name for the tag. Must be unique within the team. Maximum 255 characters.

name: tagId
description: The ID of the tag to delete.

name: name
description: The name of the status. Must be unique within the team. Maximum 255 characters.

name: statusId
description: The ID of the status to retrieve.

name: statusId
description: The ID of the status to update.

name: name
description: The new name for the status. Must be unique within the team. Maximum 255 characters.

name: statusId
description: The ID of the status to delete.

name: afterSeq
description: Return events after this sequence number. Omit to start from the beginning.

name: limit
description: Maximum number of events to return. Defaults to 100, maximum 1000.
